QuestData.Title: On Public Display
QuestData.Description: Now that I have identified Vanthir's essence from the multitude of Suramar's citizens, it may be that I can find his exact location.$b$bI believe you'll recall a similar ritual with our friend Theryn. Do not worry- there will be less screaming this time. Hopefully.$b$bCome. Let us find our missing tavernkeeper.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Thalyssra complete the Scrying Ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: That was... difficult... but I am glad we succeeded.
